member.name: M:CourseLibrary.API.Controllers.ComplaintDetailsController.GetComplaintDetails(System.String)
member.remarks: Use this endpoints to get compliant details for the login user. Ideally UI team to get email from claims

member.name: M:CourseLibrary.API.Controllers.ComplaintDetailsController.GetComplaintDetail(System.Guid)
member.remarks: Use this endpoints to get compliant detail for the unique identifier. Unique Identifier can be get from GetComplaintDetails operation
member.returns: Detail of Complaint base on unique identifier
